channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中美芬太尼合作北京期待“正能量”
item.description: The U.S. and China launched a joint counter-narcotics working group on Tuesday in the first overt sign of cooperation in tackling the spread of fentanyl since late 2019, before bilateral relations between the superpowers soured.翻译:周二，美国和中国成立了联合禁毒工作组，这是自 2019 年底以来两个超级大国双边关系恶化之前首次公开合作应对芬太尼泛滥。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾空军展示潜猎预警能力
item.description: Taiwan's air force showed off its armed-to-the-teeth submarine hunters and early warning and control aircraft on Tuesday, demonstrating how it keeps watch on the skies and waters around the Chinese-claimed island.翻译:周二，台湾空军展示了全副武装的潜艇猎手以及预警和控制飞机，展示了它如何监视中国声称拥有主权的岛屿周围的天空和水域。
item.author: Fabian Hamacher

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商宁德时代预计2023年盈利增长放缓
item.description: Chinese electric vehicle (EV) battery giant CATL forecast net profit growth of up to 48.1% in 2023 on Tuesday, representing sharply weaker growth than the previous year as it grappled with slowing demand and stiff competition.翻译:中国电动汽车 (EV) 电池巨头宁德时代 (CATL) 周二预计 2023 年净利润增长高达 48.1%，由于需求放缓和激烈竞争，该公司的增长大幅低于上年。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 退款燃料、大型股更新、中国陷入困境
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 德国将批准欧盟计划中的人工智能法案
item.description: Germany will approve the European Union's pioneering AI Act after the minister responsible for digital issues said a compromise had been reached.翻译:在负责数字问题的部长表示已经达成妥协后，德国将批准欧盟开创性的人工智能法案。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度4-12月钢铁进口量创五年新高 需求猛增
item.description: India's steel imports touched a five-year high in the first nine months of the fiscal year to the end of March, turning the country into a net importer of finished steel, according to provisional government data seen by Reuters on Tuesday.翻译:路透社周二看到的临时政府数据显示，截至3月底的本财年前9个月，印度钢铁进口量触及五年来新高，使该国成为成品钢材净进口国。
item.author: Neha Arora

item.title: 恒大清算凸显投资者对中国债务的绝望
item.description: A liquidation order for China's most debt-laden developer begins a drawn-out process for creditors that is likely to lay bare the depths of China's real-estate downturn and leave builders locked out of global debt markets as investors shun exposure.翻译:中国负债最重的开发商的清算令开始了债权人漫长的程序，这可能会暴露出中国房地产低迷的严重程度，并导致建筑商被排除在全球债务市场之外，因为投资者回避风险。
item.author: Laura Matthews, Tom Westbrook

item.title: 红海危机和亚洲农历新年来临之际空运价格上涨
item.description: Global air freight rates have climbed for the first time in seven weeks ahead of Asia's lunar new year and as attacks on Red Sea shipping prompt companies to secure costlier air cargo space.翻译:在亚洲农历新年到来之前，全球空运价格出现七周以来的首次攀升，红海航运遭受的袭击促使企业寻求更昂贵的航空货运舱位。
item.author: Lisa Barrington

item.title: 印度限制措施推动巴基斯坦大米出口创历史新高
item.description: Pakistan's rice exports are likely to jump to a record high in the year ending in June as rival India's decision to curb its own shipments forces buyers to purchase more from Islamabad, which is offering the grain at nearly 16 year-high prices.翻译:巴基斯坦的大米出口量可能会在截至 6 月份的一年中跃升至历史新高，因为其竞争对手印度决定限制本国的出货量，迫使买家从伊斯兰堡购买更多大米，而伊斯兰堡以近 16 年来的最高价格提供谷物。
item.author: Rajendra Jadhav, Ariba Shahid

item.title: 恒大的命运取决于中国当局的承认
item.description: Any liquidation of Evergrande hinges on Chinese authorities recognising the ruling of a Hong Kong court, in a decision that could also affect the city's standing as a global financial centre.翻译:恒大的任何清算都取决于中国当局是否承认香港法院的裁决，这一裁决也可能影响香港作为全球金融中心的地位。
item.author: Scott Murdoch, Clare Jim, Yu Xie

item.title: 由于需求放缓，中国豆油、豆粕期货跌至六个月低点
item.description: Soybean oil prices on China's Dalian Commodities Exchange fell for a third consecutive session on Tuesday, with soymeal prices also declining as demand slowed amid growing South American supply.翻译:周二，中国大连商品交易所豆油价格连续第三个交易日下跌，豆粕价格也因南美供应增长而需求放缓而下跌。
item.author: Mei Mei Chu

item.title: 解释者：为什么香港需要新的国家安全法
item.description: Hong Kong's government announced on Tuesday that it hopes to swiftly pass new national security laws. A public consultation document was also released. A deadline for its eventual passage into law has yet to be announced.翻译:香港政府周二宣布，希望迅速通过新的国家安全法。还发布了一份公众咨询文件。最终成为法律的最后期限尚未公布。
item.author: Greg Torode, Jessie Pang

item.title: 澳大利亚总理阿尔巴内斯：澳大利亚是南太平洋地区的“首选安全伙伴”
item.description: Australia is the "security partner of choice" for neighbouring Papua New Guinea (PNG), Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Tuesday, after the biggest Pacific Island nation said China was seeking a policing and security deal.翻译:在太平洋最大岛国巴布亚新几内亚表示中国正在寻求达成警务和安全协议后，澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞周二表示，澳大利亚是邻国巴布亚新几内亚的“首选安全伙伴”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：中国令市场担忧
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee.翻译:Ankur Banerjee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国在台商业集团预计下滑，但地缘政治担忧依然较高
item.description: Almost half of companies surveyed by the American Chamber of Commerce (AmCham) in Taiwan consider geopolitical concerns a deterrence to expanding or investing in the island but that number has significantly dropped even as China tensions remain.翻译:台湾美国商会（AmCham）调查的近一半公司认为，地缘政治担忧阻碍了在台湾的扩张或投资，但尽管中国的紧张局势依然存在，这一数字却大幅下降。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 腾讯首席执行官表示游戏业务受到威胁，人工智能迎头赶上
item.description: Pony Ma, chief executive and co-founder of Tencent Holdings , has said that the company's video games business faces great challenges from competitors but is catching up in artificial intelligence (AI) development.翻译:腾讯控股首席执行官兼联合创始人马化腾表示，该公司的视频游戏业务面临竞争对手的巨大挑战，但在人工智能（AI）发展方面正在迎头赶上。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 中东紧张局势导致油价上涨，中国经济担忧限制涨幅
item.description: Oil prices edged higher on Tuesday following a more than 1% drop in the previous session as escalating tensions in major producing region the Middle East fuelled supply concerns, though a bleak Chinese economic outlook limited gains.翻译:由于中东主要产区的紧张局势升级加剧了供应担忧，油价在前一交易日下跌逾 1% 后，周二小幅走高，但中国经济前景黯淡限制了涨幅。
item.author: Ahmad Ghaddar

item.title: 中国副总理敦促在市场暴跌之际加大对上市公司的支持
item.description: Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng on Monday called for greater support for listed companies in an effort to help stabilise capital markets, the Xinhua News Agency reported, amid a protracted stock market rout.翻译:据新华社报道，在股市持续暴跌之际，中国国务院副总理何立峰周一呼吁加大对上市公司的支持，以帮助稳定资本市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国护照持有者可以免签前往哪些国家？
item.description: China, since reopening its borders in 2023 after three years of self-imposed isolation due to COVID-19, has sealed visa waiver pacts with select countries to encourage travel of its citizens, a boon to foreign destinations wooing Chinese tourists.翻译:中国因新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 自我隔离三年，并于 2023 年重新开放边境，并与部分国家签署了免签证协议，以鼓励其公民旅行，这对吸引中国游客的外国目的地来说是一个福音。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大承认香港法院的清算令
item.description: China Evergrande on Monday acknowledged a Hong Kong court's decision ordering the liquidation of the world's most indebted property developer after it failed to offer a concrete restructuring plan more than two years after defaulting on a bond payment.翻译:中国恒大周一承认，香港法院下令对这家全球负债最重的房地产开发商进行清算，原因是该公司在拖欠债券两年多后未能提供具体的重组计划。
item.author: Reuters
